name: Zalaxiz
description:
ZALAXIZ

A basic first level of a top-down space shooter. 2 types of enemies and a boss fight.

Arrow keys to move, Space to fire.

This is a starting point, a work in progress. Next job is to upgrade the scrolling background and add some more enemies. 

The C# scripts can be found here.

 All assets are free from the Unity Asset Store.
